headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hardest Target
content: It’s not easy being the center of attention in Los Santos - especially in Hardest Target, the latest Adversary Mode to hit GTA Online. Each team has a single player with a big fat price on their head: kill the mark, earn a point. But watch out, the identity of the target changes every minute, so if you suddenly feel like there’s a bullseye right between your eyes, you’re not being paranoid. People really are trying to kill you.
